1.content:
Guidelines
If you are starting a fresh story, make the chapter title the name of that story and I will change it here. Also include a brief description about what it's about before going into the the details, so that I may place it here as well.

Chain Swap: A Man is cursed by a trickster god to swap bodies with anyone he touches. He is unable to swap back into a body he's already occupied. When he swaps into a new body the person swaps into the body he is currently occupying.

If I Were You: Two people make a comment about what they would do if they were the other person, now they find themselves in each others bodies until they fulfill the conditions they put in place.

Life Swap: Done in a reality TV show format, two people swap lives for a week. Only things might not be as they seem.

Swap Game: People play a game where lives will be swapped around.
1.title: Body Swap Anthology

11.content:
It had been so long since the nameless trickster had messed with people on Earth. Since they stopped worshiping them, Earth was off limits. The other Gods had moved on, finding new planets in the cosmos to create life and be worshiped under a new name. Eventually those civilizations would give up their faith and the gods would move on again. It had been this way since before this universe had existed, and they would continue to do this for all eternity.

Like the some of the others, the trickster god left earth about a thousand years ago as new gods moved in. They had settled on a nice planet a few galaxies away but was kicked out of the Pantheon Early. So they were gliding across the cosmos again, when they found the planet they had left a while ago. The trickster couldn't think of the last time they returned to a planet. It was honestly by accident. Still they couldn't leave without play one small trick.

The trickster focused on a random continent, without a target in mind. They found a young man, what was now considered an adult in this civilization, who was on their last year of high school. As the trickster was only passing through they would only do one trick but one that would affect the most amount of people. The trickster felt joy as they cursed the human and flew off into the cosmos, never to return.

The curse in question was a chain swap, if the cursed victim touched someone else their souls would switch places. The best part is, the soul was what was cursed, not the body. They could also never go back to a body they had been in before. They would be a catalyst for chaos. The trickster placed in some conditions though, the swap would only work on humans that were considered adults and if host of the curse was killed, it would go to the last soul it interacted with. To prevent isolation of the curse, the person would die if they didn't touch another person for a period of seven days.

* * * * *


Jackson Dawson was an 18 year old boy, he had short red hair and had a like light layer of stubble. He was underweight as he played video games and neglected to eat when he wasn't at school. He didn't have any friends and was a major introvert.

He lived with his mother as well as step-father and step-sister, the later he never got along with.

He didn't know it but while he was asleep the trickster cursed his soul. The next person he touched, he would swap bodies with and he'd never be able to be himself ever again.
11.title: Chain Swap

111.content:
Jackson yawned as he got dressed, he hated the weekdays, he always had to get up early just to go spend six hours with shitty people before he could come back home and go back play his games. He had slept in too much to have breakfast and had to be out the door in five minutes if he wanted to make it to school on time.

"Slept in again?" Janice, his mother scolded as he went by the kitchen. He just gave her a light shrug and went to the front door. "Now wait just a second..." Janice stopped him. "You're not leaving without giving your mother a hug are you?" Jackson rolled his eyes and sighed. She always did this, he was an adult now, he didn't need her hugs. Still he let her embrace him just the same.

Jackson suddenly felt rather dizzy and instead of having his mother's arms around him, he had his arms wrapped around his body. He released the hug and stepped back, unable to process what he was seeing. He looked down and his eyes went wide open, he had breasts and he had his mothers arms.

"What just happened?" His old cried as he was now examining the body he was in. He the looked at you. "Jackson?" He asked. You and your mother had just swapped bodies.

"This can't be real..." Jackson said. His new body was forty years old, overweight with shoulder length dirty blonde hair. She wasn't an attractive woman, but she wasn't ugly either. She was a chain smoker and had been since before Jackson was born.

"We switched bodies... this is unreal" his mother said as her stomach growled. "How could you go to school like this, you're starving." She went back into the kitchen to make herself some toast.

"We need to figure out how this happened and how to undo it..." Jackson stomped his mother's foot and crossed his arms across his chest, an odd feeling now that he had breasts. "Why do I feel so irritated."

"Probably the nicotine addiction," his mother replied. "I haven't had a cigarette this morning... And we will figure this out. I don't want to be in this body any more than you want to be in mine. Though I have no idea how this happened."

"Either do I," Jackson said as he went into his mother's purse and grabbed her lighter and box of cigarettes. He promised himself he'd never smoke but this feeling he had he wanted it to go away. He went out the front and sat on the porch and began smoking. His first inhale was a bit too strong so he began coughing but he eventually got the hang of it. Taking the smoke did ease his mind a little.

There was a positive side to this at least, he didn't need to go to school now, his mother was a housewife so he could stay home all day and play his games, he just wouldn't use voice chat. But he was in the body that gave birth to him, married to a trucker. He wasn't even a man anymore and he'd probably see his mother naked, at the very least he'd need to go to the toilet as her. If he had swapped bodies with his step sister he might've been tempted to strip but as his mother that was the last thing on his mind.

"We'll get through this," His mother sat down next to him and held his hand. "If we swapped, surely we can find a way to swap back."

"Thanks mum," even in each others bodies, she was a comfort to him.

"Though for now we might need to adapt to our situation, we don't know how long we might be this way."
111.title: His mother gives him a hug

1111.content:
"I think it's best if you... by which I mean me. Stays home today, I don't know anything about your school life," Janice said with a scowl, indicating that she wished Jackson would tell her more. "And I want to be here for you, to help with any adjustments."

Jackson nodded as he didn't know how to handle this. At least it meant they didn't need to worry about anything too major and because his mother stayed home, she was able to continue doing whatever she was doing. Jackson went back to his room and loaded up his games. It took him a little while to adjust though, seeing as he wasn't used to his mother's hands or fatter fingers and his reaction time was a littler slower. Still it felt good to kill some bots and forget about the crappy situation for now.

Though one thing they would not be escaping was his mother's family. He didn't consider Michael to be his dad or Cynthia to be his sister but to his mother they were family. Michael wasn't a bad person, he loved Janice and truly cared for her, he was a lot harder on Jackson though. Cynthia and Jackson didn't get along but mostly avoided each other. Those two were completely different and wouldn't even socialise if their parents were married.

Fortunately for Jackson both were out at the moment. Cynthia was also 18 and so was at school, they made their own way there and she was an early riser. Jackson's face went white, he'd be sleeping in the same bed as his step-father and after a week on the road, there was likely one thing he'd have on his mind.

Jackson needed another cigarette and so he went back out onto the porch. He didn't even know how to bring this up with his mother, he just hoped there was a solution to this problem.

Fortunately for him, it would solve itself when...

12.content:
The way this swap works is either both people must say what they were would do if they were the other person or if one person asks what the other person would do if they were them, they must then reply with "If I were you..."

Examples:

Two people are having a discussion about their lives, one is complaining about their job the other is complaining about a bratty child.
Person 1: "If I were you I'd quit that job"
Person 2: "Well if I were you, I'd send her to boarding school."
They now swap bodies and to switch back one person needs to quit the other person's job and the other person need to enroll the kid in boarding school, both conditions must be fulfilled for them to switch back.

One person is looking for advice they approach someone else.
Person 1: "What would you do if you were me?"
Person 2: "If I were you, I'd change my name and move to another country."
They'd swap bodies and could not switch back until the conditions were met.

The second idea comes from a Heidi Klum ad were she asks her assistant that question. I'd often then imagine a swap taking place.

If the conditions can no longer be met the person will not be able to switch back. So for the first example if the person was fired before they quit, they'd be stuck as each other. The conditions might be too unreasonable to follow through too, like moving to another country or the suggestion of killing someone.

Where does this story take place?

141.content:
It was evening at the town mall and all the stores were closed. There were still people working, finishing up their shifts, taking stock or preparing the store for the next day. A nasty storm had been raging outside and as the power went out. A robed figure entered the mall, completely dry, despite the heavy rain. There were at least a dozen people left in the mall as they stumbled around in the dark. Each of them saw the robed figure who beckoned them to follow.

It gathered them in the main food court, people of different walks of life, some knew each other, most only by face. The youngest was 18, the oldest was 60.

"You are my players..." the figure told each of them in a ghastly voice, their gender was indiscernible. It reached out and each persons chests glowed with a bright light. "You are unshackled from those bodies and are able to switch places not only with each other, but with others as well." No one reacted as they took the information in. They were still enthralled by the shadowy figure.

"Players, you will use this gift to play a game. Those who refuse to participate..." It reached its hand and pulled forward. A ball of energy left each body. It turned its wrist, rotating the balls so they faced the body they just came out from. Even though they were enthralled, they still had life in them. Without their souls, they were completely void. The figured flicked its hand forward and each ball reentered the proper body. "You will be at my mercy and I will chose a body for you, if I chose a body at all."

"You have twenty-four hours from midnight to play the first round. As for the game itself..."

14112.content:
"You have twenty-four hours from midnight to play the first round. As for the game itself... well I’m feeling a tad mischievous today. Call me childish but I’ve always enjoyed a good game of hide and seek. With the special stipulations I’ve included I think this game could turn out to be very interesting indeed.”

“And remember, twenty-four hours or you’re mine. Chop chop...” There was a collective gasp as the shadowy figure folder in on himself, scrunching themself so tight that they eventually disappeared from existence. The twelve patrons looked at each other in shocked silence. All was quiet but the rustle of the wind as each tried to gather their thoughts on the situation. The majority of them seemed scared witless by the announcement. Melody looked to be the most shaken one of all of them. All eyes turned her way as she whimpered, “L-like, what the f*ck?” Marie, ever the caring woman, quickly moved to the blonde’s side and consoled her.

“Yeah, what she said!,” Scott chimed in as he dipped his hand back into his bag of Doritos. All the others began mumbling to one another. Many of them were frightened at the figure’s sudden disappearance and debated about the validity of the being’s demand for them to swap bodies. Fiona was more perturbed than curious however and mumbled something to herself about having to get back to the cinema to lock up shop. “Can you guys hurry this up?,” she said as she looked to her watch, “Some of us have homes to get to.”

Shaun snorted sarcastically. “Speak for yourself, some of us ain’t exactly pumped to go back.”

“Maybe so but her point’s still good,” Tyler replied as he clutched his wife’s hand. Her breathing had become more ragged in the past couple minutes- the extra stress had made the baby inside her womb restless and now it was a struggle for her to regain her composure. “I’m gonna get you home as soon as possibleDebby and when I do, I’ll run you one of those soothing bubble baths you love, okay?” Debby groaned, as good a response as Tyler normally got when she was in discomfort like this. Bianca moved to Debby’s side and cradled her stomach reassuringly, giving Tyler a rare opportunity to step back and take a quick rest.

At the same time Brad seemed to be completely oblivious to the ‘game’ he’d just been thrust into and he’d quickly moved to Celine’s side to try and chat her up. The 27-year-old girl seemed uncomfortable though and squirmed as Brad pushed his chiselled bicep into her eye-line. All in all, it was utter chaos. Carl meanwhile was trying to logically think of his next course of action. He whistled loudly and attracted the attentions of the other eleven attendees. Due to his wizened features and no-nonsense appearance he immediately commanded respect from his onlookers.

“Alright boys and girls,” he boomed in his grizzly voice, “I understand that all of us are feeling confused right about now. The main thing to remember is that we’re all stuck in this crapheap together. So let’s get all of our heads together and figure out what to do next.”

Fiona scoffed. “‘All in this together?,’” she mocked, “What’s next, taking about our crushes and painting each other’s nails?” Behind her Melony squealed excitedly. Fiona rolled her eyes as she grabbed her leacherous son, Jack, by the arm before he started drooling at Melony’s svelte curves.

Before she could exit the mall’s revolving doors, Bianca stepper into her path. Her brown eyes were scrunched up in anger. She adjusted her circular spectacles before snarling, “Listen lady, none of us are exactly ecstatic to be in this position but the old man’s right about working this out together. So be quiet unless you have something productive to add.” Fiona raised her arms in mock surrender and walked back to the circle with her arms crossed defiantly. Carl coughed to defuse the tension. “Thank you, Miss...”

“Bianca.”

“Miss Bianca, apologies. Now, first order of business: that being or whatever it was told us that we all have to choose someone else here to exchange bodies with. Anyone have any idea what he means by that?”

Scott burped loudly as he finished off his Doritos pack. He cleared his throat pompously as he said, “It’s pretty self-explanatory, old man. I’ve been writing bodyswap fanfics for as long as I can remember and I know every one of them starts with a situation like this.” Each person in the mall looked at each other warily. “What a bunch of bull,” Brad said but it seemed like his heart wasn’t in it. Bianca furrowed her brow in concentration as she replied, “Maybe, maybe not. I’m not so sure that we should take the risk and not follow the figure’s advice.”

Debby, who’s been silent up to now, suddenly yelped, “No! Nuh-uh, no way am I just giving up my body and my baby to a complete stranger! No, there must be something else?!” Tyler helped hoist her onto her feet and steadied her on her swollen cankles. Brad guffawed. “Don’t think there’s a queue of people lining to look anything like you, babe,” he snarked. Debby lunged at him but felt her baby bump writhe once more. Soon everyone was locked into a heated argument on the idea of having to trade bodies with each other. Some suggested an equity system where the physically disadvantaged took first dibs, others suggested pulling straws and a couple even advocated for random selection.

However, the bickering bunch had forgotten about Fiona’s mischievous offspring, Jack. In the midst of the melee he’d slipped away and was admiring everyone for his own choice. Who to pick?, he thought to himself. There were too many viable candidates to pick from so he excluded the don’ts first and foremost. He ruled out Carl, Marie and Scott right away- the first two were rusty old codgers and the latter was little more than a glorified man-baby. He was tempted to pick either Brad or Tyler because of their matured physiques but how many opportunities would he get to experience being in a girl’s body. He wasn’t for stealing his mom’s body, ew, and although he liked the size of Debby’s engorged milk puppies he didn’t want to have to risk having her baby. That was an experience that he was completely fine with missing out on.

He surveyed the other three ladies. Sure Bianca and Celine were attractive in their own rights but Jack was all about the body and in that area Melony was clearly superior. He didn’t know how the process worked though. He scrunched his face tight and imagined himself being the former prom-Queen. Sure enough, he began to feel an intense tingling running along his body. He felt as the energy courses through his veins, reshaping and rebuilding his bones and tissue. He laughed as his short dark hair lengthened and cascaded down his back. He could feel his bones cracking as he shrunk down half a foot or so to Melony’s height. His hips widened as he felt the flesh on his backside balloon and swell outwards. His giggles turned even more girlish as he lost his voice box and his face reconstructed itself, rounding out and becoming more feminine.

Jack looked down on himself in shocked awe. His modest t-shirt completely swamped his new form and the Levi’s on his legs pooled around the hem of his waist. “Oh my days, holy sh..!,” he was exclaiming before he suddenly vanished from the balcony he was standing on. There was no trace of his disappearance apart from the clothes he’d been wearing that collapsed to the marble floor in his place. A couple moments later and the rest of the group ceased their arguments as a bloodcurdling scream echoed round the plaza. They turned and gaped in horror as they saw the absurd image of Jack’s body in an eerily familiar crop top and booty shorts combo.

“Son?,” Fiona asked warily. Jack’s vibrant green eyes turned towards her and she watched as they filled with tears. “Like, oh my God!,,” Melony sobbed, “I’m totally a dude now!” Everyone turned to look at one another- it was real. After a few more minutes of intense sobbing and a whole box of tissues later, Melony had finally regained some sense of composure and the group was eagerly questioning her.

“How the hell did you do that?!,” Scott asked.

“Why the f*ck are you in my son’s body?!” Fiona snarled.

“How does a male erection feel like?” They all glared at Celine. “What, so I’m curious..,” she shrugged embarrassed. Melony herself looked like she was on the verge of a mental breakdown. She didn’t have answers for any of their questions and it felt like no answer could satisfy them. Eventually Carl put an end to their interrogations and pulled Melony over for a private chat. “Sorry for the sh*tshow,” he said, “But everyone’s just a bit, how do I say this?... SCARED right now.”

“They, like, should be! I’m f*cking terrified and I’m the one that just got swapped!”

“Yeah, I can understand that. We just wanna know how it happened so we can make sure there’re no more surprise exchanges that’ll happen without our knowing.”

“That’s totally just it- I have NO IDEA how it happened. I was literally, like, sitting down by the fountain, counting all my pageant awards in my head like I normally do when I get, like, totally stressed out about stuff. Then I suddenly, like, heard this voice in my head that said I was, like, chosen for a swap or whatever. Five seconds later and I’ve got this f*cking orangutan goth body that smells like sweat, and onions, and mouldy sweatpants, and...”

“I think I get the general idea,” Carl groaned. He led a sulking Melony back to the group and explained their conversation. “So the swaps are activated by a simple selection system,” Bianca mumbled to herself as all the remaining players sized each other up. Each looked at the others hesitantly, none daring to make the first selection and triggering a trading frenzy.

The question is, what comes next?
14112.title: It's a game of Swap and Seek

141122.content:
A dramatic silence settled over the inhabitants of the near deserted mall. A plastic bag rustled as the eerie breeze made its way through. All eyes fluttered between Melony’s sulking teenage form and themselves. No-one wanted to be on the end of a disadvantageous swap but no-one wanted to make the first move. Tyler clutched his wife’s hand for support. Fiona had pulled a cigarette from her bra and was lighting it tentatively. Timid Celine stood to the side whilst Bianca adjusted her glasses and sized up her options. The others were in a similar state but none dared to do anything.

Shaun this time assumed the leadership role again and beckoned for Fiona to pass over the pack of smokes. She begrudgingly obliged and they all watched as Carl took a pair of pliers from his tool belt and snipped the ends off of some of the cigs to make them all different lengths. “Hell you doing with my fags?,” Fiona whined as she puffed out a ring of smoke. Shaun gathered the cigarettes in both of his hairy paws, cradling them in a way that each tip was at the same height and the bottoms were indiscernible. He cracked a wry smile. “Anyone up for a game of straws?”

A collective groan rolled around the group. “What,” Shaun protested, “Ain’t this the fairest way to choose who gets who? Easy logic here, longest cigarette gets first pick, next longest gets second, and so on and so on.”

“I don’t want to lose my body on just a game of random chance!,” Brad yelled, “Do you know how long it took me to reach peak physical conditions?!”

“What other way do you propose, lunkhead?,” Bianca snarked.

“She’s got a point, senor. Statistically speaking, the ten of us left all have equal probabilities to be able to choose new bodies first from the options given to us.”

“What?!,” Melony squeaked. Her preppy outfit seemed horribly out of place on her gangly body and the heavy mascara she’d applied in the mall boutique hire before had run all along her acne-ridden features. “Like, what about me? I should, like, totally get another chance to pick another body!”

Carl ran down the rigid escalator at just that moment and said, “Sorry miss, but you’ve already gotten your exchange, for better or worse. Hate to say it but you’re stuck in that kid’s body until we’ve all changed and found a way to get everything back to normal.” Melony crossed her arms childishly and began to sulk again. Fiona saw Carl come down and made her way over, asking, “Did you find him? My son, any sign of where he is?” Carl hung his head low as he produced the boy’s t-shirt and jeans from behind his back. Tears welled up in Fiona’s eyes. Carl brought the woman close to his chest, cradling her weeping head in his shoulder. “There, there, we’ll find him, don’t worry.”

“Th-that bastard demon,” Fiona sobbed and spat at the same time. Carl had been thinking and said to her, “Whatever that thing was, it said something about ‘hide-and-seek’. Maybe once your son initiated the swap he was taken somewhere to ‘hide’? Whatever, what I’m trying to say is I promise you we’ll find him.” Carl escorted Fiona back to the circle where Shaun had found himself a position in the centre.

He walked around slowly, offering a cigarette one by one to everyone standing there. There was a curse from someone as they realised their cig had been completely sliced down the middle. Once everyone (excluding Melony of course) had received one, Shaun took the last for himself. “Ok,” he said, “Everyone, open your hands on three. One, two... Three!” Shaun, Scott, Carl, Bianca, Marie, Fiona, Brad, Debby, Tyler and Celine all opened their hands and exposed their metaphorical straws to the others.

But who drew the longest straw?

14113.title: Something else

choices: Follow Brad's POV or Shaun's POV
141131.content:
Everybody was in complete disbelief. Debby Lynch convinced herself that all the stress she had been under lately was causing her to hallucinate.

Off in the corner of the room, Shaun Lincoln picked up one of his tools that he'd been using to repair a fountain drink dispenser before he could clock out. He didn't particularly enjoy spending his evenings doing work for his crappy job but it was a good excuse to keep him from going home and dealing with his wife.

He thought about what the mysterious robed figure had said as he unbolted the back of the machine to get a look at what was wrong. Glancing over towards the others, they all still seemed disturbed but tried to continue on as if nothing happened. Debby's husband, Tyler was holding her bags and looked like he was about to depart with her as soon as she finished locking up her salon. Carl already walked off to resume his hourly rounds.

Shaun already knew this machine was going to be a pain in the ass to fix. It had soda seeping out of the back of the machine onto the floor. Once he pulled the back panel off, he muttered "Son of a bitch" as he confirmed his suspicions. The people who owned the place were cheap and used the cheapest parts on all of their machines that constantly broke. It would take at least an hour to fix and clean this.

Glancing over towards the other people still here, Shaun took interest in Brad. Unlike himself, Brad seemed to have everything Shaun wanted. He was tall, muscular, good looking and most importantly wasn't married to his obnoxious cow of a wife. Shaun thought back to what just happened a minute ago. There was no way it was real. He figured that his midlife crisis was making him see and hear things.

"Too bad that crap wasn't real. If it was, I'd wish to be Brad in a heartbeat." Shaun muttered to himself as he reached into his tool bag.

But almost immediately after saying that, Shaun felt extremely warm and dizzy. The world felt like it was spinning faster and faster... until everything abruptly seemed to return back to normal. However, Shaun immediately noticed that he was now standing on the other side of the food court...
141131.title: First come, first serve

1411311.content:
(This is a clean up chapter to allow for something else to be chosen in the previous path as I only have 3 options available)

Brad had trained so hard to get to where he wanted to in life, now he was ten years older in a far less fit body. Shaun on the other hand felt better than he had in years.

The two of them had swapped lives, now they would need to deal with the consequences.
1411311.title: Follow Brad's POV or Shaun's POV

1411313.content: Everything seemed fairly normal after the creepy looking, robed dude disappeared without a trace. At least until the muscular dude that looked like he just came from the gym stopped in his tracks as his eyes began glowing. Everyone that was around immediately took notice and freaked out.
1411313.title: Someone else's POV

14113132.content:
Celine Amari watched silently as the attractive, muscular guy's eyes glowed for several seconds. They were so bright that she had to look somewhat away in order to not be completely blinded. But once their brightness died out, he looked really confused. At first he looked down at his chest, then towards his hands and arms before looking over towards the broken soda machine that a repair guy was fixing.

The repair guy briefly shrieked and freaked out before rushing over and attacking the good looking guy. "Give me back my body!" the portly repair guy demanded.

Celine couldn't believe what she was witnessing. She thought her mind was playing tricks on her when that robed man told her and everyone else that they had to pick a new body. It was so bizarre and random that it couldn't be real. People couldn't switch bodies. But it was no coincidence that not even a minute later she witnessed a man's eyes glow as if he was the Prophet followed by a scuffle and talks of stealing bodies.

Another good looking man with golden blonde hair dropped his pregnant partner's bag and rushed in to break up the fight. Celine thought that it was good timing. The older and out of shape repairman stood no chance against the muscular guy. A warm tingling sensation radiated from between her legs as she watched the muscular hunk's physique on full display. That was the kind of man she wanted but he father would never approve of.

Standing back and watching, Celine was genuinely curious to what was going on. Luckily, the security guard who just left ran back and helped split the two men apart. "I want my body back now!" the repair man screamed as he was pinned down. The muscular guy seemed pleased with himself and told him "I did what I was told to do..." before looking around over the rest of us "...that creepy hooded guy said we had to pick new bodies or else. It's not my fault I grabbed the best one first."

Every started freaking out as a few of them that knew each other started whispering amongst themselves. A young black woman asked "How did you do it?"

The muscular guy smiled at her and said "All I did was wish aloud that I was Brad. Everything began spinning and the next thing I knew, I was in his body."

Celine's jaw dropped. There was no way it was that simple. Body switching wasn't supposed to be real and if it was, it definitely wasn't supposed to be that easy.

"Well I wish I was myself again." the repairman said from on the floor. He waited a moment as nothing happened then said "I wish I was Brad again and not Shaun!" with a hint of desperation; but nothing happened.

Suddenly the young black woman said aloud "Well, I wish I was that young white guy over there." as she pointed towards a teenaged boy with reddish-brown hair that looked to be with his mother. Almost immediately like before, both of their eyes glowed brightly for several seconds before returning back to normal.

The teenaged boy immediately patted his chest and glossed over his hands as if he never seen them before with a pleased expression on his face. The boy’s mother who was standing next to him took a step back and looked absolutely horrified.

"What the F*ck did you just do!?!" the black woman shrieked from several feet away as she held out her hands and looked at them with fear.

The teenaged boy laughed and said "I'm simply moving on up in the world. Why should I struggle to get anywhere in life as a woman of color when I could easily become a white man and have everything handed to me?"

"Jack?" the homely looking redheaded woman asked the boy whom she thought was her son.

"Jack huh? I guess that's my new name now as he patted his crotch. You must be “Mom”. Your former son is over there." he said as his other hand pointed over towards the young black woman who was now cupping her breasts in disbelief.

Celine watched as other people began panicking and making a break for it after seeing what just happened. The young blonde man let Brad in Shaun's body go and hurried over towards his pregnant partner. People scattered as they ran towards the doors. Celine thought about what just happened. She needed to switch with someone too but someone else could take her body if she didn’t act fast. Celine may not have been pleased with how her life has been thus far, but she knew that she would end being up worse off if she didn’t pick someone fast.
14113132.title: Follow Celine Amari

141131321.content:
Celine quickly made up her mind. She wasn’t going to wait until someone picked her. Looking around, she quickly spotted the attractive blonde woman in capris that was with the group earlier. If she had to pick another body, she wanted one that she liked. But before she could wish to become her, Celine saw the woman stop running as her eyes began to glow.

“Damn it.” She muttered as someone beat her to that body. She quickly looked around to see what choices were left when the older redheaded woman who refused to leave without whoever was in her son’s body began to have glowing eyes too. It wasn’t hard to figure out who switched with her since the scruffy looking guy with the beard was only a few feet away from her when it happened.

Looking back towards the main doors, only 3 people were left: an old, frumpy looking Hispanic woman and the young couple. The Hispanic woman definitely wasn’t an option and she wasn’t interested in becoming a man; so that left her with only the pregnant woman left. Celine felt horrible at the thought of depriving the woman of the motherhood she was expecting and shackling her with Celine’s overbearing father but it was the best choice left for both of them.

“I wish I was that pregnant woman…” Celine said aloud. Almost immediately, she felt really warm as the world began to spin until she could no longer see anymore.
141131321.title: Chaos spreads

1411313211.content:
Meanwhile, right as Marie made it to the front doors of the mall with the Lynch couple in tow, Debby began to lose her balance. Tyler quickly caught his wife before she could fall over and was horrified as he saw her eyes glow. “Debs! No!” he cried.

Marie tried to open one of the doors as Tyler cradled his disoriented wife on the floor as if he just watched her die in his arms. But as soon as Marie pulled on the doors, they emanated a blueish glow and refused to budge.

“The doors aren’t opening…” Marie cried out over her shoulder towards Tyler and his wife in desperation.

Tyler released the body of his pregnant wife as she started waking up and quickly turned around to see who she might be now. All of the other people in the mall with them seemed either busy examining themselves or horrified at what they found.

“Tyler!” he heard his name called out. He turned his head and saw an Arabic woman wearing a hijab, a baggy sweater and jeans running towards him.

“Debs?” he asked as she approached him.

Debby nodded and said “I’m here in this woman” as she gestured towards her torso with her arms before coldly glaring down at the woman who stole her body.

Celine woke up on the cold marble floor. The first thing she noticed was that her back ached and she felt as if she ate way too much. It was hard to sit up; especially when she noticed her bulging, beach ball sized belly protruding out. But right was she was about to climb back on her feet, she noticed her old body standing over her and looking quite pissed off too.

“Give me back my body you terrorist b*tch!” she demanded.

Celine hated being insulted for her heritage but she knew that many people often resorted to petty and racial insults when they are overwhelmed with emotions. As much as she wanted to defend herself, she had a good idea of how this woman felt as she rested one of her new hands on her pregnant belly. She just robbed this woman of her child even though she had no interest in carrying it in her stead.

“I’m sorry I took your body.” Celine said in an unfamiliar voice as the blonde man joined her body at staring daggers at her. “I didn’t want to take your body or your child away from you but there weren’t many people left to choose from.”

By this time, all of the other people began making their way towards front doors. Some made their way over without a fuss while others like Melony who found herself in the body of the aged security guard, Carl was having a literal meltdown. Debby cried in her husband’s shoulder as he held her while Carl in Melony’s body took it upon himself to help Celine back on to her feet.

“Why won’t the doors open?” Marie ranted as she continued to pull on the doors. Every one she tried emitted a blueish glow when she pulled on it.

“Let me try.” Shaun said confidently as he grabbed the handle of one of the doors beside the one Marie was pulling on. But like before, it emitted a blueish glow every time he pulled on it too.

As Shaun continued to pull on the sealed door beside Marie to no avail, Bianca asked “We all swapped with someone right? That creepy guy said we all had to swap with somebody.”

Scott who was inspecting his freckled cleavage as he groped his large breasts beside Bianca said “Pretty sure we did.”

Fiona rushed to him and slapped his hands down. “Don’t you dare touch my body like that you disgusting pervert.”

“Not all of us.” Marie turned around towards the rest of the group as Shaun continued to futilely pull on the doors with all of his new found might. “I’m still myself.”

“Then what are you waiting for? Switch with whoever is left so we can all get out of here. I have a nice long bath I need to get to!” Scott demanded as Fiona clenched her manly fists in anger.

Bianca noticed that the blonde guy was holding the Arabic woman in his arms instead of his pregnant girl. “That blonde dude is the other one that didn’t switch. Switch with him so we can all get out of here.” She motioned.

Debby noticed that most of the people turned their gaze towards her Tyler. She got upset again with what was about to happen. It was bad enough that she ended up in this strange woman’s body but at least she could still be with Tyler and start their family all over again… unless he ended up in that old woman’s body.

It was Debby’s turn to try and protect her husband as everyone surrounded both of them. “No! I already lost my baby. You’re not taking my husband too.” she shouted at the mob that surrounded her.

“Look lady, we all can’t stay trapped here forever.” Bianca said coldly as she crossed her arms.

“I rather we all stayed here forever than let you run off with my life!” Jack said angrily as he tried to cross his arms over his chest like Bianca did but his new breasts got in the way. Bianca giggled as she saw Jack’s tough guy facade backfire.

Marie looked really sad as she spoke. “I’m sorry but we all have somewhere to be. I wouldn’t do this if there was another way to get out of here…”

Debby tried to lunch towards the old Hispanic woman but Tyler held on to her. “Noooo…” she screamed as she began to cry.

It didn’t make Marie feel any better. She didn’t want to steal anyone’s life –let alone someone so much younger and full of potential but many others including herself depended on it. Marie hoped that Jesus Christ would forgive her for what she was about to do. “I wish I was that young blonde guy…” she said regretfully.

Almost immediately everyone watched as both the old woman and the blonde guy’s eyes glowed brightly. Debby was was trying to lunge to the older woman felt her husband’s grip on her release. She turned around and cried as she held onto him until his eyes returned to normal.

“Tyler?” Debby asked as tears ran down her unfamiliar face.
1411313211.title: Nice guys finish last

choices: Follow someone who is now a male
Follow someone who is now a woman
14113132111.content:
“I’m sorry but I’m not your Tyler.” Marie explained to the crying Arabic woman wearing the hijab before her. Physically, Marie felt better than she ever did in the last 30 or 40 years but spiritually she felt awful. She just robbed a young man near the beginning of his life and left him in her body that’s near its end.

“It will be okay honey…” Debby heard an aged female voice behind her. She turned around and saw the older Hispanic woman look extremely sad as she examined one of her weathered hands.

Debby rushed over to her husband and embraced him. He sounded relatively calm but it was pretty obvious that he was really shaken up by being placed in the body of a woman that was almost old enough to be his grandmother.

“There was no other way... if we didn’t switch, we would have been trapped here forever.” he told her as she cried while embracing him in her arms.

“This is bullsh*t” Shaun muttered as he continued to pull on the doors that still refused to open.

Bianca “Like what the f*ck? We all switched bodies. Why can’t we leave?” she said in an effeminate manner.

Other people were equally just as confused. Celine stood in the corner cradling her belly as several people started getting at each other’s throats when that weird hooded guy appeared out of nowhere.

“I’m impressed. I gave you all 24 hours to make your picks and you ended up doing it in a few of your minutes. Now the real games can begin.” The mysterious hooded man said.

Everybody immediately stopped fighting with each other when he spoke. However, Melony in Carl’s body was extremely vocal. “Games!?! You’re a sick bastard.” She told him as she aggressively balled her hands into fists like she was about to attack him.

Marie in Tyler’s body did the sign of the cross as she said “By the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit, you shall be cast back to hell where you belong minion of Lucifer…”

The mysterious figure laughed. “Minion of Lucifer? I am beyond your silly superstitions and man made religions Marie Delores Lopez.” He then looked over towards Melony as if he was aware of what she was about to do and continued “and you Melony Anne Fields, former prom queen that never has and never will achieve anything else in life aside from spreading your legs…” His words seemed ominous and resonated with both women-turned-men. Melony’s anger turned to fear as she backed away from him.

“Now that I have you all settled down, let me explain how this game will go. All of you will put your best efforts into being a better version of the people you’ve all become. You all have one moon or one month as you mortals prefer to keep track of time with to be better people than the original inhabitants of those bodies. If anyone screws this up, I shall return and claim their souls to fuel another project of mine… which is far worse than your fictitious Hell that you fear my dear Marie. If you succeed, then I will leave you to enjoy the fruits of your new lives without my presence.” The mysterious figure explained.

Fiona didn’t seemed pleased with these rules. “But I want my body back and my son want’s his body back too!” she told the hooded man.

“Fiona… Fiona… your days as a single mother and manager of that movie theatre are over. You’re now a 32 year old, socially inept virgin that works for minimum wage at the arcade down the hall from your old life. As for your son, he will now have to learn how to live as a dark skinned woman and cope with all the setbacks that it will bring him.” he explained to her.

Some people were upset and others were pleased after hearing that they will keep their new bodies for good. The mysterious figure could sense it all. He did chuckle and said one more thing. “One more thing before I let you all go. I’m feeling somewhat generous right now, so I’ll change a couple things around.” Before anybody could ask what that was, he extended both of his arms towards both Marie and Melony. He pulled their souls out of the bodies they currently inhabited and tossed them into each other.

Marie’s senses returned as she felt numerous dull aches throughout her body and a lack of energy that she had moments ago. Looking down, she saw that she was wearing the dark blue uniform and had the aged, masculine hands that belonged to the security guard. Across from her, was the young blonde man looking just as surprised as she was. “Why?” she asked in a deeper baritone voice than she had before.

The hooded figure chuckled again. “Why? Because I felt like improving both of your odds since both of you ladies were the only ones with the literal and figurative balls to try and challenge me. I’ll tell you what Marie. If Tyler successfully finishes my game, I’ll ensure your father makes a miraculous recovery and allow you to have many years left with him. I’m sure you’re smart enough to find a way to work him into your new life.”

As the hooded figure turned around and began to walk away deeper into the mall, Debby called out to him. “What about me and my family?” she asked.

The man stopped and briefly looked over his shoulder towards her and said “What about you Debby? You’re now a single, yet unremarkable Arabic woman and your new family is extremely religious. You can either avoid crossing your new father or find a man worthy of his approval to escape his grasp. Tyler is no longer your husband and your unborn child now has new parents to care for it.”

The hooded man continued walking away and seemingly faded away as if he were a mirage. As soon as he disappeared, all the doors at the front of the mall glowed brightly one more time before fading back to normal. Shaun cautiously pulled on one of the doors and to his surprise, it opened without any resistance. He quickly stepped outside, followed by all the others. The storm was completely gone as if it never happened and the sun in the clear sky was setting.
14113132111.title: Let the real games begin

1413.content:
(The character's for this game can either be a new group or those listed in "Search for a New Body"  )

"You will be playing _________" the hooded figure told them. "I will approach you sometime in the next twenty-four hours and give you a choice. You will give me an answer and that will determine who or what you swap with, fulfill the conditions and you may end up back in your original bodies, though there's a chance you might not."

------------------------------------


The two games for ________ is either a Would you Rather game or Name association game. Alternatively the entity might've given them a different choice.

In Would you Rather they will be asked a Would you Rather question, this will result in a body swap, e.g. Would you rather be a dog or cat? If they answer cat they would swap bodies with a cat for a unknown duration of time (it could even be permanent)

In Name Association they must say a name starting with the last letter of their first name, they will then swap with someone that has that name. They cannot repeat a name and to get back to their original body they must say it again. E.G. A Lady with the name Erin might say Natalie then Erin again, meaning she could get back to her body with 1 swap, others might take longer.
1413.title: Something else

14131.content:
"Let's start with an easy one shall we," the entity smiled and looked at Jack. Jack O'Reilly just so happened to know a couple of people in this game and so would give him the first pick.

"Jack, would you rather be your mother or your Spanish teacher?" It asked allowing him to move. His eyes went wide, both choices meant that he'd be in the body of a woman.

He had to choose between coming 60 year old Marie Lopez or his 38 year old mother. It was an obvious choice, his mother was younger than his Spanish teacher and he knew her life better. It'd be uncomfortable being his mother but it was better than being mostly a stranger.

"My mother," Jack answered as the glowing orb escaped his chest and his mother's as they entered the other body. He felt dizzy as he stood beside himself.

"Fiona, your turn," the entity remained focus on Jack's body. "To undo this swap would you rather have Jack sleep with a random man or you?”

She found herself unable to answer that question not could she consult her son. They'd almost be better off trapped as they were but she didn't want that either.
14131.title: Would you Rather?

choices: Marie swaps with her father's former bosss
141313.content:
"I guess, we'll find out which one you'd rather when you do it," the hooded figure stated to Fiona before moving onto the next person.

The figure moved onto the other person Jack could've swapped with, his Spanish teacher, Marie Lopez.

Marie knew this was a joke now, it had to be, Jack was always acting up in class. She just didn't know how he was doing this or why he would pretend to be forced to swap with his mother and the condition to undo that swap. Of course he picked his mother over her, that's how he would be able to trick her.

"Marie, would you rather, be able to pay for your father's medical expenses but be despised by him for the rest of his life or give him a better life until he passes away?"

Marie found herself able to move again, she looked over towards Jack, he shouldn't have known about her father and this was a twisted thing to offer. "What kind of sick joke is this?"

"It's no joke, Ms Lopez... answer the question or I'll make the situation even worse for you."
141313.title: Marie, Would you Rather?

choices: She swaps with a highschool student
1413133.content:
Of course Marie refused to play the game, she instantly regretted it though when she found herself in a similar position to her father. She was old and frail, on a ventilator in random hospital and a body of someone she didn't know. Her new body probably had a day of life left. The person who took her place was confused on where he was and what was going on.

The other players had no idea what had happened, just that the figure had moved on to the next person. Only three people knew for certain that this game was real, and the rest of the players only knew of one supposed swap.

"Melony, you are a rather pretty woman, though I know you long for your highschool days, I am willing to grant you that again. Would you rather be the head of the school or aim to be prom queen again?"
1413133.title: Melony, Would You Rather?

14131333.content:
Now that Melony was off to her new body, one she wasn't expecting, the entity moved onto the next player, Tyler Lynch. Like the first person, he too was here with someone else, his pregnant wife, who was just short of going on maternity leave.

"Tyler, would you rather body swap with Debby permanently or give birth as ten different women?"

This would be the first swap where the person could chose to make it permanent. The entity had plans to go around offering other challenges to get them to swap back, but considering these two were husband and wife, it chose to make an exception.

Tyler would swap with the pregnant women as they went into labor or were scheduled for their C-Section and then swap out as soon as it was time for the mother to hold the baby. He would be doing all the work for none of the rewards. Or he could chose to just give birth once and remain as the mother, either way Tyler was having a baby.

info.brief_description: Bodies are Swapped, chaos is unleashed
info.description:
Background:

I have been on a body swapping high recently, it started a few months ago when I finished reading the book Where I End and You Begin. I the watched Status Change by Three Degrees of Center Productions as well as the Quarantine Leap series. I've been adding a lot to "New Body Switching Machine"  and when I was active a few months ago I did a whole brain swapping path for "The Guillotine" . I had also recently finished reading Crosswinds, which had an interesting character in it that gave the main characters an interesting threat.

I have decided to make my own interactive story involving body swapping, mostly because I would like more control over it. To be able to go back and edit what I don't like and set the ages of the characters to be at least 18. There's some great stories out there but I'm not comfortable having a 16 year old swap into the body of a twenty year old and especially not a 10 year old.

Idea:
When I write swap stories I want to try to be somewhat realistic, people will explore the bodies they find them selves in, I'm not fond of that when it's a family member and so it's dealing with being in the body of someone you might not want to see naked. I'm also all for chaos, if things can get out of hand or swaps are made to be permanent I'm fine with that. I also have no problems ending a story if it meets its narrative conclusion, such as dying or being trapped as an animal.

I am very much for male to female swaps and as a result female to male. I am fine with people losing their age by swapping with someone a generation or two older than them. I've actually had dreams where I've swapped bodies with my female cousin. Animal swaps are perfectly okay too, though without being taught they might not know how to be human. Have a man swap with someone who's pregnant.

These swaps can be done via magic, technology or super powers. Tiny remotes or giant machines are all fine, even a brain transplant. Curses too.

Issues and Structure
When I come onto Writing.com it becomes an obsession. It got so bad I've gone through two different profiles. There also doesn't seem to be as many people around as there used to be.

I have two other stories that no one has added to and I think that's because of how I did up the description, though I mostly write for myself anyway. My ideas can get away from me and I might write things I'm not usually into or go deep down a rabbit hole so I do want to reserve the right to delete or alter paths. This can be a put off for some of you.

I know not everyone is the best at writing or English is a native language but I also want to open this for all. I'm not the best at writing either. If I find an idea to be good but hard to understand I would like to fix it.

Another thing on this site I'd like to address is how some chapters people add go way off from the original suggestion or put you into a position where the path doesn't really allow to act or throws a curve ball that someone might not like. This is why 90% of the time I will put in the Something else option, the other 10% is when there's only two or three possible choices, like picking your gender. The Something else is there to allow someone to pick an option someone might've not thought of, or it could be used to change the previous chapter, going back to the choice that lead to that section.

My final issue I struggle with when it comes to interactives is going for a broad or narrow ideas. A narrow idea might be to set the story up in a University where someone has made a machine to allow for body swapping with set characters such as Jane Doe the 21 year old blonde cheerleader and Blake Jones the nerdy 20 year old. This gives a focus to the story but rules out so many potential threads. Going to broad might leave no direction but allow for endless possibilities.

For this interactive I am going to try for both approaches. The first options will be listed as Story # until a title can be developed, even if it's something simple as Swap Remote. Under each story the first path should be set up to be the premise and include a cast of characters. If don't like how the Swap Remote gets started, make a Swap Remote 2 with one of the other options.

Example:

Magic Mirror:

Brenda and James are best friends on their last year of high school, they enter a magic shop where they find this strange mirror, able to swap bodies:

Cast:

Brenda: Age 18. (enter description and traits.)
James: Age 18.
Brenda's Mum: Age 39
Brenda's sister: Age 22
James's Dog: Age 2, German Shepard

Final Thoughts:

As this is the front page and I would like the story set out to offer the most ideas possible, I decided to turn this into an area to describe what I want out of this interactive instead.

I do hope people add to it, though I will continue writing, even if I only get 10 views. I will try to keep an eye on the story and edit when able.

I hope you enjoy reading and I hope you make additions.
